br.com.stone.posandroid.hal.api.network

Class Network

  • br.com.stone.posandroid.hal.api.network.Network

  • public class Network

    This class represents the device's network configuration.

        Returns:

      • configureGlobalProxy

        public boolean configureGlobalProxy(@NotNull
                                    java.net.InetSocketAddress proxy)

        Method to configure GlobalProxy, to all network interfaces (Mobile, Wifi, Ethernet...)

        Parameters:
        proxy - Proxy Configuration, can be initialized with InetSocketAddress.createUnresolved("127.0.0.0", 8081)
        Returns:
        If proxy was configured successfully.

      • getNetworkInfo

        @NotNull
public NetworkInfo getNetworkInfo()

        Method to retrieve device network info.

        Returns:
        a NetworkInfo object with connection type, apn name, carrier name and sim serial number.
